snippet: Giants kicker Lawrence Tynes took up cobbling when he felt his shoes were not sliding through the turf smoothly on his kicks.
abstract: New York Giants kicker Lawrence Tynes, who has missed only 3 of 32 field-goal attempts this season, modifies his cleats for different field condition and kicks, shaving the studs and adjusting the fit.
lead_paragraph: Giants kicker Lawrence Tynes took up cobbling when he felt his shoes were not sliding through the turf smoothly on his kicks.

headline.seo: For the Giants’ Lawrence Tynes, Shoe Repair Is Not Just for Kicks
headline.main: Giant Is Full-Time Kicker and Part-Time Cobbler
headline.print_headline: Giant Is Full-Time Kicker And Part-Time Cobbler
